Articles.Content:
Those who remember old good spaceport and all that what SirCmpwn did to our community.

I dont think 200 $ is too much for Squad, so why the heck they dont get back spaceport? Curse is ruining our mod community and github is comblex to download files for beginners, so i recommed to get away from curse and create official spaceport!

But it is sad that squad are not going to make to back. This is just my suggestion.
The partnership with Curse likely either costs more than that or is an explanation of why there are adds everywhere.
This is the 7th(?) thread about KerbalStuff. Please do not create any more threads about this, guys.
